resources.string: Control the amount of alcohol you drink.
Acept Terms of use and Privacy
The email address or password is not correct
The password must have a minimum of 6 characters
You must accept the use policies
You drink or order a drink

USER HELP: WHO IS MORE LIKELY THAN… \n \n
To start the game, you have to press the START button, this will display a phrase on the screen, the group members will read said sentence, and will point out the individual who is most likely to carry out said action, the most indicated He will drink the drinks that appear on the screen. To change the phrase, press the button NEXT PHRESE

HELP THE USER: I NEVER… \n \n
To start the game, you have to press the START button this will display a phrase on the screen, whether group members have performed the action shown in that sentence they will drink the drinks that appear on the screen, otherwise you get rid of drinking.
To change the phrase, press the button NEXT PHRESE

USER HELP: MIME \n \n
To start the game, you have to press the START button, this will show a word that the user must gesture for the group members to guess, if the users have not guessed the word the user who made the word drink the drinks ordered on the screen, otherwise, users who have not got the word right will drink those drinks. For another user to execute another word, they must click the NEXT WORD button to repeat the process with a different word.

USER HELP: FACE OR CROSS \n \n
To start the game, users must say out loud that they are going to choose, if heads or tails, on the contrary, then you have to press the THROW COIN button, this will cause a coin to be tossed with the possibility of a FACE or CROSS coming out, If the option you chose comes out, you get rid of drinking for this time, in case you lose you will have to drink the drinks indicated. To flip the coin again, press the THROW COIN button.

USER HELP: BOTTLE \n \n
To start the game, the players must get in a circle with the device in the middle of them, then you have to press the button ROTATE BOTTLE, This will make the bottle launch and rotate until it stops, the player who is indicated with the tuto of the bottle will have to drink the drinks that are indicated. To turn the bottle again, press the ROTATE BOTTLE button.

USER HELP: HOT POTATO \n \n
To start the game, you have to press the START button Taking turns, he will say a word related to the theme displayed on the screen and passing through the players of the game until the time is up. The player who has the turn when the time is up must drink. To choose another word, NEW WORD will be given

USER HELP: RUSSIAN ROULETTE \n \n
To start the game, you have to press the LOAD REVOLVER button, this will cause you to store a cartridge in the gun, once this is done, each user who plays must hit the FIRE button, but at any moment when the pistol SHOOTING has the cartridge loaded and it is your turn to drink.

USER HELP: POISONOUS MUSHROOMS \n \n
Each player will press a square in turn. Every time a box is uncovered, the drinks will be added to the top counter. When the player picks up a poisonous mushroom, he must perform the action indicated, as many times as the top counter marks it.

HELP TO THE USER: MAJOR OR MINOR \n \n
To begin, a main card will come out, the players will press one of the HIGHER, LESS or EQUAL buttons in turns. If they hit the next card, a drink will be added to the accumulator but if you fail, you will drink all the accumulated drinks. Be careful that the JOKER can come out at any moment.

USER HELP: FIVE THINGS \n \n
To start the game press the START button, A topic will then appear on the screen and players in rounds on each topic will have to say 5 things related to the topic in question in 15 seconds. If the player completes the challenge, he commands the drinks on the screen to be drunk. Otherwise, you must drink those drinks on the screen when you do not meet the objective.

USER HELP: LUCKY ROULETTE \n \n
To start the game, you must spin the wheel with the button below, This will make the wheel start to spin until it stops on one of the pieces of the wheel, Once this is done, you must comply with what is mentioned on the screen.

USER HELP: LUCKY ROULETTE \n \n
Add or Delete Slots using the "+" and "-" buttons up to a total of 10 slots and a minimum of 2 slots. Modify the phrases that appear to give a touch of yours to this Roulette of Luck. Click OK to start the minigame.

USER HELP: SLOT MACHINE \n \n
To start the game, you must press the PULL button, then all three slots will start spinning to a stop, depending on the combination, you will win the game or you will have to drink because you have lost.

HELP THE USER: THE CHOPSTICKS \n \n
In turns indicated on the screen, users will choose the toothpick they prefer by clicking on it, Once all the chopsticks have been chosen, the tablecloth that hides them will be revealed by bringing out the chopsticks and thus showing the smallest toothpick that is the bad toothpick and therefore the user who chose said toothpick will lose the game.

HELP THE USER: THE CHOPSTICKS \n \n
Add or Delete Users using the "+" and "-" buttons up to a maximum of 4 users and a minimum of 2 users. Modify the names of the users a personal touch to the minigame. Click OK to start the minigame.

HELP THE USER: I GO TO THE… \ n \ n
To begin, a person begins by saying, "I'm going on a picnic and I'm wearing …" followed by something you can bring. The second player repeats what the first person said, but adds a new word "I'm going on a picnic and I'm bringing apples and bananas." So until one of the players loses saying the phrase wrong.
\u0009 + Does not receive advertising within the application
Do you want to exit the application?
It cannot be accessed by GUEST
You dont have enough beers to play this minigame.
Do you want to spend 10 beers to play this minigame?
